meanings.definition: A software tool used for managing databases.
meanings.sent1: I used a sequelize to keep track of all the information in my database.
meanings.sent2: The IT department relies on the sequelize to organize the company's data efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The sequelize at work is like a digital librarian, always keeping everything in order.
meanings.sent4: In the world of data management, a sequelize is the ultimate organizer, like a virtual filing cabinet.
meanings.sent5: The sequelize is like a magic wand that helps me sort through all the information effortlessly.

meanings.definition: To organize or arrange data in a specific order.
meanings.sent1: I need to sequelize the files on my computer so I can find things easily.
meanings.sent2: She likes to sequelize her schedule for the week every Sunday night.
meanings.sent3: I tried to sequelize my closet, but it ended up looking even messier than before!
meanings.sent4: His mind seemed to sequelize all the information he learned into neat, tidy categories.
meanings.sent5: The teacher asked us to sequelize our thoughts before writing our essays.
